edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.expr.common

Class CommonExpressionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.expr.common.CommonExpressionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpressionFactory

    public class CommonExpressionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExpressionFactory
    CommonExpressionFactory is used to create many CommonExpressions. Implements the ExpressionFactory interface.
